page.title: 17STORNOWAY NORTH - RELIGION
page.content: Churches in the area include:{Free {Presbyterian, High Church (Church of {Scotland), Gospel Hall (Brethern), {Salvation Army, Kingdom Hall (Jehova's {Witness).}The largest of those is the {High Church}but the{Free Presbyterian is also large.The{Scripture Union}is run in the{Stornoway Primary school and the{Nicolson Institute}and is run in age groups.The{Salvation Army}is temporarily in the Retirement Centre though it will soon have a building of its own. The{Gospel Hall}has various meetings during the week. The{Free Presbyterian}church was established in 1893 and has an average congregation of 450. The{High Church has an average of 500 people for a congregation at night. The{Bayhead {Youth Group}meets in the YMCA. with attendances of 100+.
